changeSet.author: abrin
changeSet.sql: SELECT setval('creator_id_seq', (SELECT MAX(id) FROM creator)+1); SELECT setval('authorized_user_id_seq', (SELECT MAX(id) FROM authorized_user)+1);

changeSet.author: abrin
changeSet.sql: update authorized_user set general_permission_int=5000, general_permission='ADMINISTER_SHARE' where general_permission='ADMINISTER_GROUP'
update collection set collection_type='SHARED' where collection_type='LIST'

changeSet.author: bcastel1
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO resource (id,date_created,date_updated,description,external_id,total_files,previous_status,resource_type,total_space_in_bytes,status,title,url,submitter_id,updater_id,uploader_id,account_id,description_formatted) VALUES (5000,'2013-07-01 17:21:35','2013-07-01 17:21:35.881','sample image',NULL,0,'ACTIVE','IMAGE',0,'ACTIVE','Test resource 2','',8092,8092,8092,NULL, NULL)
